title: UFC on ESPN+ 19: Make your predictions for Joanna Jedrzejczyk vs. Michelle Waterson
text:
We want your predictions for Saturday’s UFC on ESPN+ 19 event in Tampa, Fla.

Our staff picks feature includes the consensus picks from MMA Junkie readers. Simply cast your vote for each bout below, and we’ll use the official tallies that are registered by Thursday at noon ET (9 a.m. PT).

Those MMA Junkie reader consensus picks will be part of the UFC on ESPN+ 19 event staff predictions we release Friday ahead of the event. UFC on ESPN+ 19 takes place Saturday at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. The card streams on ESPN+.

(Editor’s note: This story will update after the UFC announces a new opponent for Thomas Gifford on the main card.)

Make your picks for all five current main-card fights inside:
description: We want your predictions for Saturday's UFC on ESPN+ 19 event in Tampa, Fla.
